meanings.definition: In a way that cannot be disputed or questioned.
meanings.sent1: She unarguably finished first in the race.
meanings.sent2: The sun unarguably rises in the east every morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat unarguably believes it is the ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: His talent for painting is unarguably a gift from above.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's patience is unarguably her greatest strength.

meanings.sent1: The team unarguably won the championship.
meanings.sent2: It is unarguably true that the Earth is round.
meanings.sent3: The magician unarguably made the rabbit disappear with a wave of his hand.
meanings.sent4: Her smile unarguably brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was unarguably breathtaking.
